thread.title: Mum shares photo to warn parents of meningitis symptoms | Calendar
thread.title_full: Mum shares photo to warn parents of meningitis symptoms | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Mum shares photo to warn parents of meningitis symptoms | Calendar
text:
A heartbreaking photograph capturing the final moments of a six year old boy suffering from meningitis has been shared by his mother.
Marc Poole, known as MJ, died just two days after showing the first signs of the deadly disease.
Now his family from Doncaster has chosen to share the image online as a warning to other parents.
Warning Martin Fisher's report contains some distressing images:
Play video Last updated Fri 24 Feb 2017 Doncaster
